Now we are talking TAPAS!Wonderful ambiance and food! I highly recommend this restaurant. I have eaten in very many of this tapas cafes and restaurant and this is one of the best. We recommend crujientes de alcachofas al Oporto (incredible), chips of berenjena caramelizada con queso de cabra, croquetas de setas y alcachofas y  pescadito fritos!!!Buen provecho!
